message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I really like the product, but I have to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This is still a great deal for you, and it allows me to make a reasonable profit. What do you say?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to go up to $10,800. That's my final offer, and I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.
